column4: I was wondering if anyone out there has had experience w/ getting a Hauppauge HVR-850 to work under the latest Ubuntu.

I have located a few resources online regarding drivers/firmware that needs to be installed ect..I have downloaded the latest firmware from a resource (http://linuxtv.org/wiki/index.php/Hauppauge_WinTV-HVR-850) but there is (what appears to be a simple instruction (s), but it doesn't work. Anyone out there able to help w/ this issue?
After installing new firmware (I think I did it OK) still nothing works.  I have posted my logs on this link.
Please don't flood; use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste; don't use Enter as punctuation.
